name: Cattle and Crops
description: Driving tractors is fun! Experience the excitement of country life and cultivate your fields with huge machines. Gather in the harvest, feed your animals with it and get the cycle of food production going.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: CPU: Intel Dual-Core 2 GHz or similar AMD CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon 6700 HD or above (with 1 GB VRAM or above) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: CPU: Intel Quad-Core 3 GHz or similar AMD CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon 580 RX (with 4 GB VRAM or above) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
